home.title: Home

presentation.title: Hi, I'm Antoine
presentation.subtitle: Full-stack and Mobile Developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional applications

home.welcome-to-my-portfolio:
Welcome to my portfolio!
Here you will be able to learn more about me and my projects.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I am currently a 5th year student at Epitech and I am passionate about software development. I have experience in a wide range of technologies and programming languages, and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: If you are interested in seeing some of my work, you can check out my projects below. I have worked on a variety of projects, including web applications, mobile applications, and games. I am always looking for new projects to work on, so if you have an idea for a project, feel free to reach out to me.

about.title: About
about.introduction: Hi! My name is Antoine and I am a Full-stack and Mobile Developer based in Lille, France. I am currently a 5th year student at Epitech Lille, where I am preparing to graduate as a Software Engineer Expert. I am passionate about software development and I have experience in a wide range of technologies and programming languages. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

messages.content: My name is Antoine, I'm a student in Lille (ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·)
What and where do you study?
I'm currently a 5th year student at Epitech Lille, preparing to graduate as a Software Engineer Expert.
Sounds cool! What are your skills?
I'm passionate about Mobile, Full Stack, Front-end, Back-end development and UI/UX Design.
Nice! What kind of projects have you worked on?
I have worked on a variety of projects, including web applications, mobile applications, and games.
I'm always looking for new challenges, so if you have a project idea, feel free to reach out!
Okay! What are your career goals?
I want to work in an innovative and dynamic company, where I can continue to learn and grow as a developer.
Do you have any hobbies appart from coding?
Yes, I enjoy music, sport and playing video games. I also like to travel and discover new places.
Cool! How can I get in touch with you?
You can simply answer this message or check out my contact page for more information.
I would be pleased to discuss with you!
